languages.text: {n}Кибелла оценивающе смотрит на вас.{/n} "Ты извест{mf|ен|на} своим талантом к рукопашной схватке. Тело твое закалено, и, может быть, тебе удастся освоить некоторые наши приемы. Но наше искусство — не только набор движений. Это еще и умение отдаться танцу смерти без остатка. Дабы сражаться как мы, тебе пришлось бы опустошить себя. Начать с чистого листа, отвергнув не только титул Домин, но и память о прошлом".

{n}Kibellah gives you an appraising look.{/n} "None dispute your skill in close combat. Your body is well hardened, and perhaps you could even learn some of our techniques. Our art, however, is more than just patterns of movement — it is one's ability to give oneself completely to the dance of death. To fight as we do, you would have to empty your being, to start anew, to reject both the title of Domin and all the memories of your own past."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла оценивающе смотрит на вас.{/n} "Ты извест{mf|ен|на} своим талантом к рукопашной схватке. Тело твое закалено, и, может быть, тебе удастся освоить некоторые наши приемы. Но наше искусство — не только набор движений. Это еще и умение отдаться танцу смерти без остатка. Дабы сражаться как мы, тебе пришлось бы опустошить себя. Начать с чистого листа, отвергнув не только титул Домин, но и память о прошлом".

Our art, however, is more than just patterns of movement. It is one's ability to give themselves to the dance of death completely. To fight as we do, you would have to empty your being. To start anew, to reject both the title of Domin and the memories of your own past."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah te examina con la mirada.{/n} «Nadie pone en duda su capacidad en combate cuerpo a cuerpo. Su cuerpo está bien entrenado, y tal vez pueda incluso aprender alguna de nuestras técnicas. Nuestro arte, en cambio, es más que meros patrones de movimiento: es la habilidad de abandonarse por completo al baile de la muerte. Para luchar como nosotros, tendría que vaciar todo su ser y empezar de nuevo, rechazando el título de Domin y todos sus recuerdos del pasado».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives you an appraising look.{/n} "None dispute your skill in close combat. Your body is well hardened, and perhaps you could even learn some of our techniques. Our art, however, is more than just patterns of movement — it is one's ability to give oneself completely to the dance of death. To fight as we do, you would have to empty your being, to start anew, to reject both the title of Domin and all the memories of your own past."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah te examina con la mirada.{/n} «Nadie pone en duda su capacidad en combate cuerpo a cuerpo. Su cuerpo está bien entrenado, y tal vez pueda incluso aprender alguna de nuestras técnicas. Nuestro arte, en cambio, es más que meros patrones de movimiento: es la habilidad de abandonarse por completo al baile de la muerte. Para luchar como nosotros, tendría que vaciar todo su ser y empezar de nuevo, rechazando el título de Domin y todos sus recuerdos del pasado».

languages.text: {n}キベラはあなたに鋭い視線を送った。{/n} 「あなたの接近戦の腕前は確かです。あなたの身体はよく鍛えられていて、我々の技を覚える事もできるかもしれません。ですが、我々の技は単なる動きではないんです。死の踊りに身を捧げなければいけない。我々のように戦うには、自分の存在を空っぽにし、新たなスタートを切り、ドミンの称号も自分の過去もすべて切り捨てなければいけません」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives you an appraising look.{/n} "None dispute your skill in close combat. Your body is well hardened, and perhaps you could even learn some of our techniques. Our art, however, is more than just patterns of movement — it is one's ability to give oneself completely to the dance of death. To fight as we do, you would have to empty your being, to start anew, to reject both the title of Domin and all the memories of your own past."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラはあなたに鋭い視線を送った。{/n} 「あなたの接近戦の腕前は確かです。あなたの身体はよく鍛えられていて、我々の技を覚える事もできるかもしれません。ですが、我々の技は単なる動きではないんです。死の踊りに身を捧げなければいけない。我々のように戦うには、自分の存在を空っぽにし、新たなスタートを切り、ドミンの称号も自分の過去もすべて切り捨てなければいけません」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈以评判的目光看了你一眼。{/n}“你的近战技巧毋庸置疑，身体也非常强壮，或许你确实可以学习一部分我们的战斗技术。不过，我们的艺术并不仅仅在于动作本身，它更侧重于完全沉浸于死亡之舞的能力。若要像我们一样战斗，你必须彻底遗忘你学到的一切，重新开始，拒绝‘秘者’这个头衔，消除过去的所有记忆。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives you an appraising look.{/n} "None dispute your skill in close combat. Your body is well hardened, and perhaps you could even learn some of our techniques. Our art, however, is more than just patterns of movement — it is one's ability to give oneself completely to the dance of death. To fight as we do, you would have to empty your being, to start anew, to reject both the title of Domin and all the memories of your own past."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈以评判的目光看了你一眼。{/n}“你的近战技巧毋庸置疑，身体也非常强壮，或许你确实可以学习一部分我们的战斗技术。不过，我们的艺术并不仅仅在于动作本身，它更侧重于完全沉浸于死亡之舞的能力。若要像我们一样战斗，你必须彻底遗忘你学到的一切，重新开始，拒绝‘秘者’这个头衔，消除过去的所有记忆。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah mustert dich prüfend.{/n} "Niemand zweifelt an Euren Fähigkeiten im Nahkampf. Euer Körper ist gestählt, und vielleicht könntet Ihr sogar einige unserer Techniken erlernen. Unsere Kunst besteht jedoch nicht nur aus Bewegungsmustern – es geht darum, sich dem Tanz des Todes komplett auszuliefern. Um zu kämpfen wie wir, müsstet Ihr Euer Sein entleeren, neu beginnen und sowohl den Titel Domin als auch sämtliche Erinnerungen an Eure eigene Vergangenheit ablegen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives you an appraising look.{/n} "None dispute your skill in close combat. Your body is well hardened, and perhaps you could even learn some of our techniques. Our art, however, is more than just patterns of movement — it is one's ability to give oneself completely to the dance of death. To fight as we do, you would have to empty your being, to start anew, to reject both the title of Domin and all the memories of your own past."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah mustert dich prüfend.{/n} "Niemand zweifelt an Euren Fähigkeiten im Nahkampf. Euer Körper ist gestählt, und vielleicht könntet Ihr sogar einige unserer Techniken erlernen. Unsere Kunst besteht jedoch nicht nur aus Bewegungsmustern – es geht darum, sich dem Tanz des Todes komplett auszuliefern. Um zu kämpfen wie wir, müsstet Ihr Euer Sein entleeren, neu beginnen und sowohl den Titel Domin als auch sämtliche Erinnerungen an Eure eigene Vergangenheit ablegen."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah vous jauge du regard.{/n} « Vos talents en combat rapproché sont incontestables. Votre corps est endurci, et peut-être même seriez-vous capable d'apprendre certaines de nos techniques... Pour autant, notre art ne se résume pas à un enchaînement de coups ; toute sa subtilité réside dans la capacité de chacun à s'abandonner totalement à la danse de la mort. Pour combattre comme nous, vous devriez faire le vide dans votre esprit, recommencer de zéro et rejeter à la fois le titre de Domin et tous les souvenirs de votre passé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives you an appraising look.{/n} "None dispute your skill in close combat. Your body is well hardened, and perhaps you could even learn some of our techniques. Our art, however, is more than just patterns of movement — it is one's ability to give oneself completely to the dance of death. To fight as we do, you would have to empty your being, to start anew, to reject both the title of Domin and all the memories of your own past."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah seni bakışıyla değerlendiriyor.{/n} "Yakın çatışmadaki yeteneklerini inkâr eden yok. Vücudun iyice güç kazanmış. Belki tekniklerimizden bir şeyler bile öğrenebilirsin. Ancak dövüş sanatımız, sırf hareket örüntülerinden ibaret değildir... Kişinin kendini ölüm dansına tamamen kaptırabilme kabiliyetidir. Bizim gibi savaşabilmek için tüm varlığından feragat etmen, sil baştan başlaman, hem Domin ünvanını hem de geçmişine dair tüm anılarını ardında bırakman gerekir."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah gives you an appraising look.{/n} "None dispute your skill in close combat. Your body is well hardened, and perhaps you could even learn some of our techniques. Our art, however, is more than just patterns of movement — it is one's ability to give oneself completely to the dance of death. To fight as we do, you would have to empty your being, to start anew, to reject both the title of Domin and all the memories of your own past."
